annonstext:
Did you know that fishing is the world’s most popular hobby? We do! And here at Fishbrain we have created the world’s largest social network dedicated to people who love fishing. We want to make sure that we can give them the greatest experience possible and make their fishing dreams come true, no matter where they are in the world.

We have over 11 million users all over the world who have logged over 10 million catches in our app. We’re growing fast, both in our social network and in the company, which is why we’re looking for a Cybersecurity Engineer.

As a cybersecurity engineer you will work close to various teams including infrastructure, backend, and client (web and mobile) engineers to enhance SDLC following standards such as OWASP SAMM, ASVS and support the organisation by security training awareness, and help the company to be secure by design. You will work closely with the higher management level to assess the security roadmap and priorities based on the company's need and budget to evaluate 3rd party products and services in regard to empowering our development and product teams to achieve their goals safely.

Your daily work will involve

- Vulnerability hunting and manual penetration testing
- Implementing and maintaining SAST,  DAST, and automating security checks
- Recommendations and architecting the infrastructure
- Monitoring and investigating alerts, or uncommon behaviors
- Educating different groups of people about cybersecurity with different level of maturity (Developers, Marketing, Finance, Etc)
- Threat modeling for services, implementing and maintaining protections, monitoring systems, EDR
- Managing Firewalls, WAFs & Bot detection, IAMs and access controls
- Help to improve our IR plan, and information security policies

What we are fishing for

- At least 5 years of relevant working experience in modern tech companies.
- Good knowledge of programming
- Application security expert and having offensive security PoV
- Good knowledge of secure SDLC
- Good communication skill
- Familiarity with cloud services & terraform
- Be familiar with ISO 270001, OWASP, NIST, CIS

Our Bait
We have trust in our employees which means that 1. you will be given a lot of responsibility from day one and 2. we value your opinions and ideas. No matter the team, everything we do has an impact on our users and on Fishbrain as a company. Our culture is very important to us. If you have a “win as a team” mentality, are passionate and like to have fun, then Fishbrain is the place for you!
